data.title: Sun days in German cities 1986-2016
data.meta_description: This statistic shows the number of sun days in the months of June, July and August from 1986 to 2016 in selected cities in Germany.
data.text:
Days of sunshine in selected cities in Germany 1986-2016

Published by Statista Research Department,

Number of sun days in June, July, August in selected cities in Germany from 1986 to 2016*
